thing-type.label: Zone
thing-type.description:
A separated part of the protected area that can supervised by a detector connected to the alarm system.
The system supports the following zones:
  • hardwired - on the control panel electronics board, in keypads and expanders. The number of available hardwired zones is determined by the control panel during identification procedure.
  • wireless - in the INTEGRA 128-WRL control panel and/or when the ACU-120, ACU-270, ACU-100 or ACU-250 controller is connected. The number of available wireless zones depends on the number of wireless devices registered in the system and is determined during the procedure of adding the devices.
  • virtual - zones which physically do not exist, but have been programmed as FOLLOW OUTPUT or are controlled by means of a keyfob.

parameter.name: id
parameter.label: Zone number
parameter.description: Number that identifies the zone in the alarm system

channel-type.description: Active when violation is detected in the zone

channel-type.description: Active when detector in the zone is tampered

channel-type.label: Alarm
channel-type.description: Active when violation is detected in the zone and zone is armed

channel-type.label: Tamper alarm
channel-type.description: Active when detector in the zone is tampered and zone is armed

channel-type.label: Alarm memory
channel-type.description: Memorized alarm state for the zone

channel-type.label: Tamper alarm memory
channel-type.description: Memorized tamper alarm state for the zone

channel-type.label: No violation trouble
channel-type.description: Active when no violation has been detected in the zone for configured time

channel-type.description: Memorized masked state for the zone
